mapper.insert: insert ignore into task ( biz_id, inst_id, bar, begin, end, task_limit, task_threads, task_interval, create_at ) values ( #{bizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begin,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{end,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{taskLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskThreads,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskInterval,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
